Understate: The claim understates the fact that NRIs can only register online for voting in the upcoming general election, but they still have to physically be present at the polling booth to cast their votes.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or official statements from the Election Commission of India to back up the claim that NRI voters will be able to vote online in 2019.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that NRIs who hold an Indian passport can vote online, without considering the additional requirement of being physically present at the polling booth.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation exists, as the claim is partially true in terms of NRIs being able to register online for voting, but not being able to cast their votes online.
